creator: tagunov@motor.ru
text:
Hello, developers!

To my great grief can not render subj.

Failures:

* where are the 
top and bottom rulers I have asked for?
* why are not the PNG images scaled to fit? (docbook itself 
uses "auto" for all, but I have manually changed for scale-to-fit for the content-width - did not 
help)
* where is the numbering for odd pages?
* why are the pages in wrong order?

(these are 
the parameters I pass to docbook-xsl 1.60.1
  paper.type "'A4'"
  header.rule 1
  footer.rule 
1
  double.sided 1
)

Created attachment 6253
failing .fo file with a generated .pdf (cvs fop snapshot of one the latter days)
creator: tagunov@motor.ru
tagunov@motor.ru
text: * why does text overlap in certain places?

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
You realize that the FOP you're working with is not intended to be used, yet?
It's under heavy development and by no means guaranteed to work. It represents 
our redesign effort.

If you want to work with the latest code that works, you need to download the 
sources from CVS using tag "fop-0_20_2-maintain" as described here:
http://xml.apache.org/fop/dev/index.html

Really invalid :-)
Somehow it works on 0.20.5.
creator: atagunov@ipmouse.com
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
